idea-plugin.name: CreateConfig
idea-plugin.description:
"CreateConfig" is a plugin that allows you to easily create and install configuration files in your project.
Key features: - Create and install configuration files in your project. - Support for customizable settings.
Usage: 1. Open your project. 2. Click "Create Config" from the toolbar. 3. Select the file in which you want to install the configuration. 4. In the popup menu, select one of the available configuration files.
Set configuration: 1. Open your project. 2. Click "Create Config" from the toolbar. 3. Select "Settings" in the popup menu. 4. Select customization options. 4. Click "OK" to install the configuration.
The "CreateConfig" plugin simplifies the process of creating and installing configuration files in projects, enhancing development productivity and providing greater flexibility in project setup.
